page.title: Competitive Exam Preparation Program
page.subtitle: Empowering Youth to Ace Competitive Exams

accordion.title: Program Overview
accordion.content: Structured learning modules, expert guidance, and strategic preparation to excel in competitive exams. Covers all major subjects with detailed study plans and regular assessments.

accordion.title: Comprehensive Resources & Support
accordion.content: Access study materials, mock exams, video lectures, and 24/7 mentor help. Includes digital libraries, past papers, and interactive modules.

accordion.title: Why Join Our Program?
accordion.content: 95% success rate, personalized learning, experienced faculty, and career guidance to help students achieve their dreams.

accordion.title: Success Stories & Impact
accordion.content: Join over 10,000 alumni in top government roles, MNCs, and top exam rankings including UPSC, SSC, and Banking.
